text: Peter Mokaba Stadium is a sports stadium in Polokwane, South Africa. == FIFA World Cup == The stadium hosted four games at the 2010 FIFA World Cup. Is one of the 10 stadiums where World Cup games were played. 2010 World Cup Matches All times are given in South African Standard time (UTC+2). Date Time Group Team #1 Team #2 Sunday, 13 June 13:30 Group C Algeria Slovenia Thursday, 17 June 20:30 Group A France Mexico Tuesday, 22 June 20:30 Group B Greece Argentina Thursday, 24 June 16:00 Group F Paraguay New Zealand == Other websites == * Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA) Category:FIFA World Cup stadiums Category:Football stadiums in South Africa Category:Limpopo
title: Peter Mokaba Stadium
